name: @pmac/utility
author: Max Zakharzhevskiy
description: Password manager domain credential switch utility

scripts.packbin: rm -rf dist && tsup --cjsInterop --entry.pmac ./src/index.ts && pkg -t node18-win-x64 -o pmac2 dist/pmac.js
scripts._makebin_old: del pmac.exe && pnpm build && pkg -t host -o pmac dist/index.js && pnpm copy
scripts._makebin_0: del pmac.exe && pnpm build && pkg -t host -o ../../pmac dist/index.js
scripts._makebin: del pmac.exe && pnpm build && pkg -t node-14-win-x64 -o ../../pmac dist/index.js
